March 14, 2009 D Welsh Area (Third Section)
Welsh Area (Third Section) 30 Test Piece Contest Welsh Area welsh-area-third-section National Championship of Great Britain (Third Section Final) None Wales
Third
The Once and Future King
Brangwyn Hall, Swansea, Swansea County, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - Norman James (trombone) Ynyshir. Prizes - 1st £200, 2nd £100, 3rd £75. 6 bands competed.
March 15, 2009, 7:15 p.m. July 8, 2020, 7:42 p.m.
1 Royal Buckley Town Band Paul Lovatt-Cooper
2 Ynyshir Band Dean Evans
3 Cross Keys Silver Band Kerry Bowden
4 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Band Glyn Rhys Davies
5 Ogmore Valley Silver Band Ivor Barnett
